document.full_text: the united states made the right decision to kill al qaeda leader osama bin laden, according to an online poll on www.reuters.com on monday that also gives president barack obama a boost.
document.title: most agree with u.s. killing of bin laden: poll
lines_and_colors: the united states made the right decision to kill al qaeda leader osama bin laden, according to an online poll on www.reuters.com on monday that also gives president barack obama a boost.
